entry.title: My fist English Class
entry.content:
# Short Talk

(In fact, i want to improve my English through writing some articles in English.)

# My teachers

One of my teacher is a Chinese,while the other one is an English(maybe,i'm not certain,forgive me)
When i typing the article you see, i'm taking my foreign teacher's spoken English class.

# My class

The spoken English class focuses on discussion.
Yet my classmates are pretty shy so that few discusions happened when we were dvided into the same discuss room.
